# The Original Scandinavian Sauna

Where contemporary architecture meets Scandinavian tradition.

A true expression of Scandinavian Design: Functional, Minimalistic & Timeless.
Each sauna is carefully designed by our architect, custom-made from premium
materials and built on-demand by our artisan carpenters, offering a truly
authentic Scandinavian Sauna experience.

We offer our meticulously designed Original Sauna Series as well as completely
Bespoke Sauna projects, tailored to particular lifestyle or business needs.

Contact Us

* * *

  * ## "Extremely high quality with wonderful design."

_— Stefan Wanzenried, Switzerland_

  * ## “Amazing quality! Amazing features! Truly best in class!”

_-Chris MacDonald, Denmark_

  * ## “The final product is absolutely stunning"

_-Sean, Ireland_

  * ## "Makes a very solid impression, has a great design and is very comfortable."

_\- Alexander Behringer, Germany_

  * ## “Uncompromising approach and attention to detail. The care for quality in their product clearly pays off. ”

_— Alexander Kølpin, Denmark_

  * ## "The thought behind every detail is reflected in the experience."

_\- Sarah Guise, UK_

See More Reviews

* * *

## **The Original Series**

## **Small Scandinavian Sauna**

Smaller, yet highly powerful and tweaked to perfection.

The smallest and lightest of our Scandinavian Sauna series fits easily into
most gardens, requires a minimum of space and even smaller cars can transport
it.

Learn More

* * *

## **Medium Scandinavian Sauna**

This mid-size sauna includes a compact changing area and corner seatings.
Smaller groups of sauna enthusiasts & rental businesses enjoy its comforting
features and flexibility.

Learn More

* * *

## Large Scandinavian Sauna

Spacious, comfortable, and exceptionally powerful.

The largest model in our Scandinavian Sauna collection, is particularly
popular with hotels, businesses, and individuals who enjoy hosting sauna
sessions with friends.

This sauna is ideal for larger groups seeking a luxurious and relaxing sauna
experience.

Learn More

* * *

# Bespoke Design

Our architect designs bespoke mobile and permanent saunas from scratch.
Working close with our clients, we navigate the design process from brief,
through development and final delivery and installation.

From the first time you describe your idea until you rest on the bench,
enjoying the heat, we are with you every step of the way.

If you are interested, please reach out.

See Bespoke Projects

# Looking to start a mobile sauna rental business?

We help many mobile sauna rental businesses getting started with their new
ventures. The significant advantage lies in the convenience of being able to
start earning only moments after receiving your Scandinavian Sauna. Moreover,
investing in a high-quality sauna is paramount, as it ensures durability and
lasting value over the years, unlike a cheaper barrel sauna that may
depreciate quickly.

Contact Us

* * *

_"As an owner of multiple saunas I can say with ease that Scandinavian saunas
trumps all other mobile saunas I've experienced. Incredible attention to
detail, and fantastic use of space are at the heart of the design. It is a
very warm, cosy and modern atmosphere whilst retaining a strong traditional
feel to the interior. Performance wise it is far superior to other models and
I would highly recommend this sauna to anyone looking for a great quality,
longer lifespan unit. The team is also very efficient to deal with and have
been very prompt with any queries I've had. Great work!"  
  
_ \- Colin, Ireland  
Owner of a Medium Scandinavian Sauna & Founder of Skellig Sauna

See more reviews

My Sauna Guide

## Medium Scandinavian Sauna

This mid-size sauna includes a compact changing area and corner seatings.
Smaller groups of sauna enthusiasts & rental businesses enjoy its comforting
features and flexibility.

Measures: 3,5 x 2m / Weight: 1500-1700 kg

#### **Floor Plan Option A: With changing room  
F**its: 6 people

**Sauna with trailer:**  
24.000 Euro* excl. local VAT  
177.000 DKK* excl. moms  
 **  
Sauna without trailer:**  
19.000 Euro* excl. local VAT  
140.000 DKK* excl. moms

#### **Floor Plan Option B: Full Sauna Room  
** Fits: 8 people

**Sauna with trailer:**  
24.900 Euro* excl. local VAT  
184.000 DKK* excl. moms  
 **  
Sauna without trailer:**  
19.900 Euro* excl. local VAT  
147.000 DKK* excl. moms

Request a Quote

**  
***Excluding delivery cost. Please see delivery priceshere

## Interior Features Included

#### WALLS & BENCHES

Locally sourced Scandinavian Spruce makes up the fully insulated interior
walls while the generous 2m seating levels are made of bright Aspen timber
which feels colder and more comfortable against the skin compared to other
types of wood. Well integrated and hidden ventilation system for optimal
airflow adjustments. Please note, the sauna shown features benches in Thermo-
treated aspen, which is slightly darker than regular Aspen. Surcharge for
Thermo-aspen: +575 Euro.

#### CHANGING ROOM

An ideal feature for both private and commercial saunas. The space is
thoughtfully arranged to store personal items securely, providing convenience
and organization. Its design also functions as an airlock, effectively serving
as a windbreak and maintaining the internal temperature of the sauna.

Image by: Wasing Wild Swim & Sauna

#### HANGER

The changing room in includes a back-lit hanger with a minimalistic
Scandinavian design for your convenience before and after your sauna session.

#### LIGHTS

Dimmable hidden LED lights powered by rechargeable batteries. The lights are
controlled via a touch panel and can be dimmed to create any desired
atmosphere.

#### FLOOR

Fully insulated untreated A+ Quality Scandinavian Spruce Flooring provides a
natural and pristine foundation for your sauna space. With its smooth, fully
flat surface, it facilitates easy cleaning, making it ideal for simple and
efficient broom maintenance.

#### 15-MINUTE SANDTIMER

Experience your private sauna session with our 15-minute sand timer. This
simple yet essential tool ensures a safe and effective sauna experience by
providing a structured time frame for your session.

#### TERMO-HYGROMETER

This essential device precisely measures temperature and humidity, allowing
you to customise your sauna environment for maximum comfort and wellbeing.
Gain realtime insights into conditions, enabling you to create a personalised
and health focused sauna routine.

#### WATER BUCKET & SCOOP

In our Original Series, we include a sauna water bucket with a wooden-handled
scoop to ensure a comfortable and safe experience during your steamy sessions.

#### OVEN

Our chimney and oven is meticulously crafted and proudly bears the CE Mark,
ensuring it’s compliance with strict European safety standards. In addition to
it’s safety features, our wood burner oven is designed to deliver great and
quick heat performance.

The remote-controlled, dimmable LED lights can create a variety of
atmospheres, ranging from bright illumination to a soft, candlelit ambiance.

## Exterior Features Included

#### CLADDING

Our saunas are meticulously crafted with quality timber, incorporating fully
insulated A+ quality Scandinavian Spruce exterior cladding treated three times
for enhanced durability and resilience against harsh weather conditions.

#### WINDOW

Our Original saunas features a grand, non-mirrored unobstructed panorama
window measuring 1m x 1.5m, providing a captivating view of the surrounding
nature. The window is made of toughened glass for durability and safety.

#### DOOR

Constructed from durable toughened glass, our entrance door features a black
door stopper and lock, offering both security and a visually pleasing design.
This not only introduces additional light into the sauna room but also expands
the outward view.

#### STAIRS

Your sauna will be delivered with a robust bespoke-made detachable stair,
meticulously crafted from steel and A+ grade black coated wooden boards. This
durable design ensures both strength and functionality, providing a reliable
solution for your entrance to your sauna.

#### KEY LOCK

Included is a key lock-box with code to make it convenient for you to keep the
key handy.

#### TRAILER

Your sauna will be delivered with a custom-built, galvanised, EU type-approved
trailer with brakes. This robust trailer ensures adherence to European
standards, delivering both safety and durability. NOTE: The photo is showing a
factory coated trailer (Surcharge upgrade: +975 EUR )

#### ROOF

The fully insulated premium-quality steel roof is designed to be highly
durable and minimalistic, offering a reliable solution for long-lasting
protection. Backed by a 60-year warranty, it guarantees excellence in quality
and longevity.

## _“_ ** _Performance wise it is far superior to other models …_** _”_

_As an owner of multiple saunas I can say with ease that Scandinavian saunas
trumps all other mobile saunas I've experienced. Incredible attention to
detail, and fantastic use of space are at the heart of the design. It is a
very warm, cosy and modern atmosphere whilst retaining a strong traditional
feel to the interior. performance wise it is far superior to other models and
I would highly recommend this sauna to anyone looking for a great quality,
longer lifespan unit. The team is also very efficient to deal with and have
been very prompt with any queries I've had. Great work!_

 _\- Collin Walsh founder of_ _Skellig Sauna_

* * *

## “ ** _A masterpiece in terms of construction and attention to detail. “_**

 _A masterpiece in terms of construction and attention to detail. Beautifully
designed and crafted. I bought the large sauna almost 2 years ago and it is in
superb working order. Very well insulated which is key for me to run the sauna
as a business, ‘Saltee Sauna’, Ireland. Jakob, Cecile and their crew have been
more than helpful to me, very personable, excellent customer service. If you
are shopping for a wood fired sauna I can highly recommend Scandinavian Sauna.
From using it several times a week for long hours I can see that this sauna is
built to last many, many years._

 _\- Conor Barry founder of Saltee Sauna_
